Texts.Chs: 耳廓狐不喜欢吃鱼。萨凡纳其实没有鱼，也没有很多蜥蜴和两栖类。不明白来自水域的可怕怪物有多么有思考能力。更令人惊讶的是：鲛人真的很博思。 总是在思考。用大量的词汇和文字来解释事物。烦人。
Texts.Eng: Fenerox people dislike fish. Savannah not really have fish, or many of lizurds and amfibyuns. Not understand how horrifying monster from water places is having thinking brains. Even more surprise: Hylotl is -really- thinky. Always thinking. Using lots of words and writings to explain things. Annoying.

Texts.Chs: 大多数时候，鲛人让人害怕。尽量避免，因为他们会说话，当他们说话的时候，他们的三只眼睛会看着。有没有被三只眼睛看过？不是吗？总是吓得发抖。此外，眼睛并不真正像哺乳动物的眼睛一样正常地眨眼睛。取而代之的是灵魂的空虚和恐惧。避免！与人都喜欢到海里去，所以很容易。
Texts.Eng: Mostly, Hylotl scary. Avoid if can, because them will talk, and when them does their three eyes do watching. Ever been watch by *three* eyes? No? Shiver-scare always. Also, eyes not really blink normal like mammal eyes. Instead, is soul-empty and horror. Avoid! Fish men keep to seas, so is easy.
